jokers.name: Joker
jokers.effect: +4 Mult

jokers.name: Greedy Joker
jokers.effect: Played cards with  Diamond suit give +3 Mult when scored

jokers.name: Lusty Joker
jokers.effect: Played cards with  Heart suit give +3 Mult when scored

jokers.name: Wrathful Joker
jokers.effect: Played cards with  Spade suit give +3 Mult when scored

jokers.name: Gluttonous Joker
jokers.effect: Played cards with  Club suit give +3 Mult when scored

jokers.name: Jolly Joker
jokers.effect: +8 Mult if played hand contains a Pair

jokers.name: Zany Joker
jokers.effect: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

jokers.name: Mad Joker
jokers.effect: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair

jokers.name: Crazy Joker
jokers.effect: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Straight

jokers.name: Droll Joker
jokers.effect: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Flush

jokers.name: Sly Joker
jokers.effect: +50 Chips if played hand contains a Pair

jokers.name: Wily Joker
jokers.effect: +100 Chips is played hand contains a Three of a Kind

jokers.name: Clever Joker
jokers.effect: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Two Pair

jokers.name: Devious Joker
jokers.effect: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Straight

jokers.name: Crafty Joker
jokers.effect: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Flush

jokers.name: Half Joker
jokers.effect: +20 Mult if played hand contains 3 or fewer cards

jokers.name: Joker Stencil
jokers.effect: X1 Mult for each empty Joker slot. Joker Stencil included (Currently X1)

jokers.name: Four Fingers
jokers.effect: All Flushes and Straights can be made with 4 cards

jokers.name: Mime
jokers.effect: Retrigger all card held in hand abilities

jokers.name: Credit Card
jokers.effect: Go up to -$20 in debt

jokers.name: Ceremonial Dagger
jokers.effect: When Blind is selected, destroy Joker to the right and permanently add double its sell value to this Mult (Currently +0 Mult)

jokers.name: Banner
jokers.effect: +30 Chips for each remaining discard

jokers.name: Mystic Summit
jokers.effect: +15 Mult when 0 discards remaining

jokers.name: Marble Joker
jokers.effect: Adds one Stone card to the deck when Blind is selected

jokers.name: Loyalty Card
jokers.effect: X4 Mult every 6 hands played 5 remaining

jokers.name: 8 Ball
jokers.effect: 1 in 4 chance for each played 8 to create a Tarot card when scored (Must have room)

jokers.name: Misprint
jokers.effect: +0-23 Mult

jokers.name: Dusk
jokers.effect: Retrigger all played cards in final hand of round

jokers.name: Raised Fist
jokers.effect: Adds double the rank of lowest ranked card held in hand to Mult

jokers.name: Chaos the Clown
jokers.effect: 1 free Reroll per shop

jokers.name: Fibonacci
jokers.effect: Each played Ace, 2, 3, 5, or 8 gives +8 Mult when scored

jokers.name: Steel Joker
jokers.effect: Gives X0.2 Mult for each Steel Card in your full deck (Currently X1 Mult)

jokers.name: Scary Face
jokers.effect: Played face cards give +30 Chips when scored

jokers.name: Abstract Joker
jokers.effect: +3 Mult for each Joker card (Currently +0 Mult)

jokers.name: Delayed Gratification
jokers.effect: Earn $2 per discard if no discards are used by end of the round

jokers.name: Hack
jokers.effect: Retrigger each played 2, 3, 4, or 5

jokers.name: Pareidolia
jokers.effect: All cards are considered face cards

jokers.name: Gros Michel
jokers.effect: +15 Mult 1 in 6 chance this is destroyed at the end of round.

jokers.name: Even Steven
jokers.effect: Played cards with even rank give +4 Mult when scored

jokers.name: Odd Todd
jokers.effect: Played cards with odd rank give +31 Chips when scored

jokers.name: Scholar
jokers.effect: Played Aces give +20 Chips and +4 Mult when scored

jokers.name: Business Card
jokers.effect: Played face cards have a 1 in 2 chance to give $2 when scored

jokers.name: Supernova
jokers.effect: Adds the number of times poker hand has been played this run to Mult

jokers.name: Ride the Bus
jokers.effect: This Joker gains +1 Mult per consecutive hand played without a scoring face card

jokers.name: Space Joker
jokers.effect: 1 in 4 chance to upgrade level of played poker hand

jokers.name: Egg
jokers.effect: Gains $3 of sell value at end of round

jokers.name: Burglar
jokers.effect: When Blind is selected, gain +3 Hands and lose all discards

jokers.name: Blackboard
jokers.effect: X3 Mult if all cards held in hand are  Spades or  Clubs

jokers.name: Runner
jokers.effect: Gains +15 Chips if played hand contains a Straight

jokers.name: Ice Cream
jokers.effect:
+100 Chips 
-5 Chips for every hand played

jokers.name: DNA
jokers.effect: If first hand of round has only 1 card, add a permanent copy to deck and draw it to hand

jokers.name: Splash
jokers.effect: Every played card counts in scoring

jokers.name: Blue Joker
jokers.effect: +2 Chips for each remaining card in deck

jokers.name: Sixth Sense
jokers.effect: If first hand of round is a single 6, destroy it and create a Spectral card

jokers.name: Constellation
jokers.effect: This Joker gains X0.1 Mult every time a Planet card is used

jokers.name: Hiker
jokers.effect: Every played card permanently gains +5 Chips when scored

jokers.name: Faceless Joker
jokers.effect: Earn $5 if 3 or more face cards are discarded at the same time

jokers.name: Green Joker
jokers.effect:
+1 Mult per hand played 
-1 Mult per discard

jokers.name: Superposition
jokers.effect: Create a Tarot card if poker hand contains an Ace and a Straight

jokers.name: To Do List
jokers.effect: Earn $4 if poker hand is a [Poker Hand], poker hand changes at end of round

jokers.name: Cavendish
jokers.effect:
X3 Mult 
1 in 1000 chance this card is destroyed at the end of round

jokers.name: Card Sharp
jokers.effect: X3 Mult if played poker hand has already been played this round

jokers.name: Red Card
jokers.effect: This Joker gains +3 Mult when any Booster Pack is skipped

jokers.name: Madness
jokers.effect: When Small Blind or Big Blind is selected, gain X0.5 Mult and destroy a random Joker

jokers.name: Square Joker
jokers.effect: This Joker gains +4 Chips if played hand has exactly 4 cards

jokers.name: SÃ©ance
jokers.effect: If poker hand is a Straight Flush, create a random Spectral card

jokers.name: Riff-Raff
jokers.effect: When Blind is selected, create 2 Common Jokers

jokers.name: Vampire
jokers.effect: This Joker gains X0.1 Mult per scoring Enhanced card played, removes card Enhancement

jokers.name: Shortcut
jokers.effect: Allows Straights to be made with gaps of 1 rank

jokers.name: Hologram
jokers.effect: This Joker gains X0.25 Mult every time a playing card is added to your deck

jokers.name: Vagabond
jokers.effect: Create a Tarot card if hand is played with $4 or less

jokers.name: Baron
jokers.effect: Each King held in hand gives X1.5 Mult

jokers.name: Cloud 9
jokers.effect: Earn $1 for each 9 in your full deck at end of round

jokers.name: Rocket
jokers.effect: Earn $1 at end of round. Payout increases by $2 when Boss Blind is defeated

jokers.name: Obelisk
jokers.effect: This Joker gains X0.2 Mult per consecutive hand played without playing your most played poker hand

jokers.name: Midas Mask
jokers.effect: All played face cards become Gold cards when scored

jokers.name: Luchador
jokers.effect: Sell this card to disable the current Boss Blind

jokers.name: Photograph
jokers.effect: First played face card gives X2 Mult when scored

jokers.name: Gift Card
jokers.effect: Add $1 of sell value to every Joker and Consumable card at end of round

jokers.name: Turtle Bean
jokers.effect: +5 hand size, reduces by 1 each round

jokers.name: Erosion
jokers.effect: +4 Mult for each card below [the deck's starting size] in your full deck

jokers.name: Reserved Parking
jokers.effect: Each face card held in hand has a 1 in 2 chance to give $1

jokers.name: Mail-In Rebate
jokers.effect: Earn $5 for each discarded [rank], rank changes every round

jokers.name: To The Moon
jokers.effect: Earn an extra $1 of interest for every $5 you have at end of round

jokers.name: Hallucination
jokers.effect: 1 in 2 chance to create a Tarot card when any Booster Pack is opened

jokers.name: Fortune Teller
jokers.effect: +1 Mult per Tarot card used this run

jokers.name: Juggler
jokers.effect: +1 hand size

jokers.name: Drunkard
jokers.effect: +1 discard each round

jokers.name: Stone Joker
jokers.effect: Gives +25 Chips for each Stone Card in your full deck

jokers.name: Golden Joker
jokers.effect: Earn $4 at end of round

jokers.name: Lucky Cat
jokers.effect: This Joker gains X0.25 Mult every time a Lucky card successfully triggers

jokers.name: Baseball Card
jokers.effect: Uncommon Jokers each give X1.5 Mult

jokers.name: Bull
jokers.effect: +2 Chips for each $1 you have

jokers.name: Diet Cola
jokers.effect: Sell this card to create a free Double Tag

jokers.name: Trading Card
jokers.effect: If first discard of round has only 1 card, destroy it and earn $3

jokers.name: Flash Card
jokers.effect: This Joker gains +2 Mult per reroll in the shop

jokers.name: Popcorn
jokers.effect:
+20 Mult 
-4 Mult per round played

jokers.name: Spare Trousers
jokers.effect: This Joker gains +2 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair

jokers.name: Ancient Joker
jokers.effect: Each played card with [suit] gives X1.5 Mult when scored, suit changes at end of round

jokers.name: Ramen
jokers.effect: X2 Mult, loses X0.01 Mult per card discarded

jokers.name: Walkie Talkie
jokers.effect: Each played 10 or 4 gives +10 Chips and +4 Mult when scored
